channel.title: {{{{3 Easy SERVER QUESTIONS@@@@))))))))))))))))
channel.description: I dled my first source called blank scape a while back and i've really improved my coding and editing and my server has become pretty good (gonna open to public hopefully next month:DD) anyway ;D i need some help finding a ags model my server didn't come with an ags so i guess i'm gonna have to code it in. could someone please direct me to a ags model+ spec dl? thanks ok i was trying to code in a dueling ring the other day and this tut told me to go to clickmost.java so i search my client and source for it found nothing help please? one last thing all of my weapons dont have specs lmao and i've heard coding specs can be hard but i've got plenty of time to learn and plenty of time to do it please direct me to a guide on how to get specs in thanks guys!

item.title: {{{{3 Easy SERVER QUESTIONS@@@@))))))))))))))))
item.dc:creator: @yeoldhag yeoldhag
item.description:
@yeoldhag wrote:

I’m not to good on modeling, but there is a tut in the modeling section. You put the ags code in your client.java. Mines under ’ attackTimer = 7; ’ may be different for you. Also, are you testing spec on a npc? some servers specs work on players just not on npcs, could be your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: {{{{3 Easy SERVER QUESTIONS@@@@))))))))))))))))
item.dc:creator: @b3ast b3ast
item.description:
@b3ast wrote:

[quote=“yeoldhag, post:2, topic:343052”]1. Ags model and spec are client related, goes on client section.
2. Idk
3. Well I’d try to find a tut, but ill give you a basic example.
This would be ags code:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){
setAnimation(305);
specialAmount -= 50; // how much spec bar you lose
getHit(5);
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee) + misc.random(50); // the damage bit
specOn = false; // turns spec off
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); // timing
specGFX(729);
if(hitDiff > 85) {
hitDiff = 85; // max hit is 85
}
}

Not all spec codes this big and scarey however. This in my anchor spec:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4508 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAmount -= 50;
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit+playerMaxHit/2);
if(hitDiff > 81) {
hitDiff = 81;
}

Also, do the spec just not work, or there is not spec option? If theres no spec option try looking in special.java[/quote] i have the spec option its just when i click no special happens ok and on the ags where would i get the model for it though and where would i paste if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){
setAnimation(305);
specialAmount -= 50; // how much spec bar you lose
getHit(5);
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee) + misc.random(50); // the damage bit
specOn = false; // turns spec off
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); // timing
specGFX(729);
if(hitDiff > 85) {
hitDiff = 85; // max hit is 85
}
}

Not all spec codes this big and scarey however. This in my anchor spec:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4508 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAmount -= 50;
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit+playerMaxHit/2);
if(hitDiff > 81) {
hitDiff = 81;
} sorry new to rsps:)

Read full topic

item.title: {{{{3 Easy SERVER QUESTIONS@@@@))))))))))))))))
item.dc:creator: @yeoldhag yeoldhag
item.description:
@yeoldhag wrote:

  1. Ags model and spec are client related, goes on client section.
  2. Idk
  3. Well I’d try to find a tut, but ill give you a basic example.
    This would be ags code:
    if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){
    setAnimation(305);
    specialAmount -= 50; // how much spec bar you lose
    getHit(5);
    hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee) + misc.random(50); // the damage bit
    specOn = false; // turns spec off
    lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); // timing
    specGFX(729);
    if(hitDiff > 85) {
    hitDiff = 85; // max hit is 85
    }
    }

Not all spec codes this big and scarey however. This in my anchor spec:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4508 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAmount -= 50;
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit+playerMaxHit/2);
if(hitDiff > 81) {
hitDiff = 81;
}

Also, do the spec just not work, or there is not spec option? If theres no spec option try looking in special.java
